data.name: ListCodeDefinitionNames
data.description: Lists all code definition names in a given path. Extracts function names, class names, method names, and other code definitions from source files.
data.input_variable_description: The path parameter specifies the directory path to search for code definitions.
data.raw_content: Lists all code definition names in a given path by extracting function names, class names, method names, and other code definitions from source files.
